name: Orc Adventurer
description:
Orc Adventurer is a super running and jumping adventure game that takes you in a new world full of dynamic action and suspense.
 The goal of Orc Adventurer game is to earn as many points as you can, by collecting coins in your way and avoiding obstacles. The more coins you collect the more points you gain.
It's very fun and easy to play, just touch the screen at the right time to jump and nothing else.
Orc Adventurer arcade game is an exciting free endless running game for kids (girls and boys), of all ages, including awesome graphics and sounds.
If you want to test your reflex and have a lot of fun, download Free Orc Adventurer for your Android device.
